activities: ividence handles email advertising campaigns. The company collects end-users data from publishers (email and personal information) and sends advertising on the behalf of these publishers. All end-users gave their consent to publisher for receiving advertisement. Each campaign has a one click unsubscribe link. Publisher data can be stored in US based or Europe-based data centers. Data transfer can take place between the USA and Europe for preparing and sending advertising campaigns.
personaldata: Customer data (end-user) including name, address, household data; demography - not manually processed
privacyprograms: Any end-user can access the data we store, and ask this data to be updated or deleted. Any end-user can request to no longer receive advertisement form one or several given publishers or advertisers.
